oai_dc:dc.dc:title: K x-ray satellite spectrum of Al by photon excitation
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: SURESH, P
REDDY, BS
REDDY, TS
RAJU, MLN
RAO, BVT
RAO, BM
MURTI, MVR
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: sodium
alpha
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: K x-ray satellite spectra of Al in the element and its oxide Al(2)O(3), generated by photon excitation, have been studied with a plane crystal spectrometer. The energies and relative intensities of the K(alpha) x-ray satellite and K(beta) low-energy satellite have been measured and compared with theoretical estimates. The results in the element and its oxide are compared to look for chemical effects.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: JOURNAL OF PHYSICS B-ATOMIC MOLECULAR AND OPTICAL PHYSICS, 33(8), 1645-1652
